sourcing.instructions: - Indium: Available from specialty metal suppliers or online chemical retailers.
steps: - Indium: Available from specialty metal suppliers or online chemical retailers.
1. Measure out 10 g of Indium, 5 g of Magnesium, 15 g of Lead, and 5 g of Praseodymium accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 10 g of Indium, 5 g of Magnesium, 15 g of Lead, and 5 g of Praseodymium accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. Transfer the blended mixture into a heat-resistant crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the blended mixture into a heat-resistant crucible.

steps: 1. Allow the crucible to cool slowly to room temperature after the heating period, approximately 4-6 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Allow the crucible to cool slowly to room temperature after the heating period, approximately 4-6 hours.

steps: 1. Use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth the edges and surfaces of the solid sample to achieve a uniform finish.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth the edges and surfaces of the solid sample to achieve a uniform finish.
